hymn.title: I'm a sinner without one plea
hymn.category: Assurance and Joy of Salvation—Satisfied with Christ

layout.singingstanza: I'm a sin -- ner with -- out one plea, But the Lamb of God in me; I was lost and with -- out hope But my Sav -- ior came and sought me out. 'Tis my sto -- ry and my song; To the world I say so long; I now walk and live in light With the New Je -- ru -- sa -- lem in sight. Till the end of days, He will be with me And lead me to that place; I give my all: My life, my ways, my thoughts, And ev -- ery -- thing to Him, my love.

lyrics.stanza: Till the end of days, He will be with me And lead me to that place; I give my all: My life, my ways, my thoughts, And everything to Him, my love.

Sometimes I think that I might leave And wallow in misery, But then graciously He comes And applies His gentle, soothing touch. 'Tis my story and my fight; To the self I say goodbye; I now walk and live in light With the coming kingdom full in sight.
